column2:
“When did you say you were returning to Amsterdam?”
“You know exactly when, because I told you: tomorrow morning.”
“Can you get back earlier?”
“I could. There’s a KLM flight at four forty-five p.m. today that would get me into Amsterdam just before six.”
At four-forty-five Miss Haddon went to tea with the Principal, who explained why she desired all the pupils to learn the same duet. It was part of her new co-ordinative system.

The next day Bill took only ten minutes of the twenty-minute break allotted for the afternoon and left at fifteen minutes before five. He parked the car in the lot just as Arlene hopped down from the bus.
And it's the state that looks after it. And I've got two drivers assigned to me. So when it's a quarter to five one of them is sure to call:' Are you going home, Semyon Ivanovich?'
